p:
The results from the quantitative and qualitative analysis of essential oils constituents are presented in Table 1: the average yield of the essential oils was 0.2%. More than 40 compounds were isolated, detected and most of them identified for each essential oil sample. The dominant components were identified to be linalool, methyl chavicol, citral and nerol.Table 1
